backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata linking Valentine UI behaviors to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining color variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/.rebuild-trigger: Timestamped file used solely to force rebuilds without affecting app logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main Valentine experience component handling phases, evasive No button logic, audio cues, and finale sequence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context managing login, stored identities, and status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Romantic-themed global styles, animations, and layout rules for intro, question, and finale phases.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing the projectâ€™s Valentine app requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for build planning.
